snippet.title: Now Man Flies (STEAM GREENLIGHT TRAILER)
snippet.description:
«Now Man Flies» — this game is about about the cosmical adventures where you are trying to discover different planets, but this is not as easy as it sounds, you should be careful: there are meteorites and space pirates and they are a big problem!
«Now Man Flies» — high-level arcade game. Reach the new heights, enemy spaceships are follow you and they want to kill you!
When you will discover 99 planets you will see ONE MYSTIC PLANET and you will unlock one new game mode.

STEAM GREENLIGHT: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=864626372

2 Game Modes - Original Mode (You need to discover the planets in that game mode), Survival (Endless run: fly as long as you can)
Dynamic Gameplay
Missions, Boosters
Mystic Planet (Discover 99 planets to unlock SECRET PLANET)
Steam Trading Cards
